revised_title: Lyginodendron and Heterangium: Fossil Plants of the Coal Measures
tldr: This article examines the organization and structure of the fossil plants Lyginodendron and Heterangium from the Carboniferous period. The author discusses the vegetative structures of these plants and their relation to ferns and cycads. The article also explores the stems, leaves, and roots of Lyginodendron, providing detailed descriptions of their anatomy and structure.
